summary: The implementation covers most backend and frontend requirements comprehensively. However, several acceptance criteria are partially implemented or missing: workout plan editing/deletion functionality is incomplete in the UI, client progress summaries for trainers are not visible, real-time branding updates may not fully work, and charts/graphs for client progress use basic implementations. The visual theme requirement (REQ-15) regarding energetic colors avoiding blue/purple is not evident in the code. Some features like live preview of branding changes are missing from the UI.

missing_requirements.requirement: Trainers can update existing workout plans
missing_requirements.reason: The WorkoutPlanForm component only handles creation. No edit interface is visible in TrainerDashboard or related components.
No delete functionality is implemented in the trainer UI components. The backend has deleteWorkoutPlan but no frontend integration is evident.

missing_requirements.requirement: View client progress summaries and completion rates
missing_requirements.reason: The trainer dashboard shows clients and allows plan creation, but there is no visible implementation for viewing client progress summaries or completion rates.
BrandingControls shows a logo preview but does not provide a live preview of color scheme changes before saving.

missing_requirements.requirement: Design a professional fitness-focused visual theme with energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple unless customized)
missing_requirements.reason: The code shows default colors (#FF6B35, #F7931E, #C1121F) which are appropriate, but there is no evidence in the diff that the base theme avoids blue/purple. The theme implementation relies on customizable branding rather than a foundational fitness-focused design.
